good.message: %s distracted a mini P.E.K.K.A with a butterfly. +500 credits.
%s brought a cannon cart for everyone to ride. +75 credits.
%s threw a goblin barrel inside the bank. +500 credits.
%s cut through the security like a P.E.K.K.A. +750 credits
%s pulled down the wizard's hood and distracted everyone. +500 credits
%s stopped the princess from firing at their comrades. +75 credits
%s sent goblins to loot. +500 credits
%s was distracting the archer by showing their archery skills. +75 credits
%s used a skeleton barrel to distract the archers. +75 credits
%s stole a hog. +500 credits
%s got the guards to deliver everyone pizza. +25 credits
%s saved the crew with a heal spell. +25 credits
%s stole a balloon and got away. +75 credits
%s befriended a doot. +500 credits.
%s reprogrammed the flying machine to attack the guards. +1000 credits
The baby dragon's fumes hid %s while they were stealing the gold. +750 credits.
%s brought sleeping gas for the guards. +500 credits.
%s found a miner's tunnel! +2000 credits.
%s released the Royal Hogs to distract the guards +500 credits.
%s cloned the crew to confuse the guardsmen +250 credits.
%s used a Rage spell to run past everyone and escaped +20 credits.
%s rode the Goblin Giant to escape +100 credits.

Bad.message: A butterfly brought P.E.K.K.A. to %s.
The Magic Archer took out %s from far away. Where did he come from?
%s made a big mistake and got caught by the 3 musketeers.
The baby dragon found something new for their barbeque, grilled %s
The Dark Prince charged at %s and got them with his mace.
The witch used her destructo beams on %s
The baby dragon found something new for their barbeque, grilled %s
The Dark Prince charged at %s and got them with his mace.

What's that in the sky? A skeleton barrel fell on %s and they got surrounded!
A princess caught %s on fire!
The Barbarian Barrel crushed and sliced %s

A goblin barrel landed right on %s.
The Zappies made %s unable to move and they got captured.
The Executioner did its job with %s

%s forgot about the lava hound's pups
%s probably shouldn't have brought arrows to a rocket fight.
The tornado brings %s straight to the dungeon.
The lumberjack decided to chop something other than wood and chopped %s into pieces.
%s found a mini P.E.K.K.A.
%s got blown up by a bomber.
%s got pounded by a mega knight.
%s got surrounded by a skeleton army.
%s fell into a tombstone and got trapped.
%s was burned by a wizard and got thrown into jail.
An archer was doing trick shots and hit %s.
Hog rider ran over %s.
The guards found %s.
A balloon dropped a bomb on %s.
A dart goblin shot %s with a paralysis dart.
The bats heard %s while they tried to escape through a cave.
The bowler bowled %s straight to the dungeon.
The miner caught %s in his tunnels.
%s got injured from the prince's lance.
%s was surrounded by the witch's skeletons and was captured.
%s was surrounded by the enemy and captured.
The barbarians found %s.
%s was frozen by an Ice Spirit and was captured.
%s got shot by a musketeer while trying to escape, but survived!
%s was sniped by a princess. Gotcha!
%s exploded from a Giant Skeleton's bomb.
%s triggered a tesla.
Lightning struck %s and was electrocuted.
The last thing %s saw was Sparky's shot charged up.
%s tried to sneak behind a giant but failed.
%s tripped on a log.
%s got distracted by an ice golem and didn't realize they were captured until it was too late.
%s got zapped by an electro wizard and got arrested.
The inferno tower cooked %s. How did they survive?
%s was caught by a bandit at the last minute.
The Mega Knight smushed %s.
A swarm of goblins stabbed %s to death.
The Magic Archer's arrow pierced through %s.
Zappies stunned %s and captured them.
The Hunter hunted down %s.
The Royal Ghost jump-scared %s.
%s was buried in a Giant Snowball.
%s was trampled by the Royal Hogs.
Rascals trapped %s in bubble gum.
Battle Ram smashed %s out of the way.
The Cannon shot %s.
Fire Spirits gave a warm hug to %s.
